segment.source: Customize Internet Explorer 11 installation packages
segment.target: Customize Internet Explorer 11 installation packages

segment.source: Customize Internet Explorer 11 installation packages (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Customize Internet Explorer 11 installation packages (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Customize Internet Explorer 11 installation packages
segment.target: Customize Internet Explorer 11 installation packages

segment.source: You can customize Internet Explorer 11 to support various browser behaviors, multiple operating system versions and languages, and Setup information (.inf) files.
segment.target: You can customize Internet Explorer 11 to support various browser behaviors, multiple operating system versions and languages, and Setup information (.inf) files.

segment.source: Topic
segment.target: Topic

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Using IEAK 11 to create packages
segment.target: Using IEAK 11 to create packages

segment.source: How to use the Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) and the IE Customization Wizard 11 to set up, configure, deploy, and maintain IE11.
segment.target: How to use the Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) and the IE Customization Wizard 11 to set up, configure, deploy, and maintain IE11.

segment.source: Create packages for multiple operating systems or languages
segment.target: Create packages for multiple operating systems or languages

segment.source: How to create multiple versions of your custom installation package, to support multiple operating systems or languages.
segment.target: How to create multiple versions of your custom installation package, to support multiple operating systems or languages.

segment.source: Using .INF files to create packages
segment.target: Using .INF files to create packages

segment.source: How to use the Microsoft® Windows Setup Engine to automate setup tasks and customize your component installations.
segment.target: How to use the Microsoft® Windows Setup Engine to automate setup tasks and customize your component installations.

segment.source: In addition, you can configure IE before, during, or after deployment, using these tools:
segment.target: In addition, you can configure IE before, during, or after deployment, using these tools:

segment.source: IE Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11).
segment.target: IE Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11).

segment.source: Creates customized installation packages that can be deployed through your software distribution system.
segment.target: Creates customized installation packages that can be deployed through your software distribution system.

segment.source: For more information about the IEAK 11, see Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) - Administration Guide for IT Pros.
segment.target: For more information about the IEAK 11, see Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) - Administration Guide for IT Pros.

segment.source: Group Policy.
segment.target: Group Policy.

segment.source: Configures and enforces IE11 settings.
segment.target: Configures and enforces IE11 settings.

segment.source: For more information about settings and configuration options, see Group policy objects and Internet Explorer 11 (IE11).
segment.target: For more information about settings and configuration options, see Group policy objects and Internet Explorer 11 (IE11).

segment.source: Unattend.xml.
segment.target: Unattend.xml.

segment.source: Customizes some of the IE settings during your Windows installation.
segment.target: Customizes some of the IE settings during your Windows installation.

segment.source: This option only applies if you're updating a Windows image with IE11.
segment.target: This option only applies if you're updating a Windows image with IE11.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: You'll only see the new IE11 Unattend.xml settings if your Unattend.xml file's associated with a Windows image that includes the IE11 update.
segment.target: You'll only see the new IE11 Unattend.xml settings if your Unattend.xml file's associated with a Windows image that includes the IE11 update.

segment.source: For more information about editing and using the Unattend.xml file, see Unattended Windows Setup Reference.
segment.target: For more information about editing and using the Unattend.xml file, see Unattended Windows Setup Reference.

segment.source: For more information about using the Windows System Image Manager, see Windows System Image Manager Technical Reference.
segment.target: For more information about using the Windows System Image Manager, see Windows System Image Manager Technical Reference.
